summary: We reviewed expenditures of federal funds reported by 39 Planned Parenthood Federation of America (PPFA) affiliates. PPFA affiliates, which operate over 600 centers across the U.S., receive federal funding to provide health-related services to patients. From 2016-18, the 39 affiliates spent over $270 million in federal funds. The Department of Health and Human Services funded most of these expenditures—about $256 million (or 94% of total...
title: Health Care Funding: Planned Parenthood Federation of America Affiliates' Expenditures of Federal Funds, 2016 through 2018
